MODELLA MANUFACTURING COMPANY, Inc., Plaintiff-Appellant, v. FAMOUS BATHROBE CO., Inc., Defendant-Appellee. No. 279, Docket 24358. United States Court of Appeals Second Circuit. Argued March 15, 1957. Decided May 3, 1957. Nemeroff, Jellzne, Danzig & Paley, New York City (pern E_ Henninger^ New York City, of counsel), for plaintiff-appellant. William R. Liberman, New York City, for defendant-appellee.

*955Before HINCKS, STEWART and LUMBARD, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Affirmed on the opinion of District Judge Cashin, 151 F.Supp. 542.
